chapters.title: Remote Paradise
chapters.description: Maya Chen discovers something unsettling about her company's return-to-office mandate.

chapters.title: The Mandate
chapters.description: As the return-to-office policy is announced, Maya uncovers disturbing patterns in employee behavior and network traffic.

chapters.title: Last Day of Freedom
chapters.description: On her final day of remote work, Maya receives a cryptic warning from a colleague and prepares for an uncertain future.

chapters.title: The New Normal
chapters.description: Maya's first day in the office reveals the terrifying reality of the company's transformation and the mysterious power of ancient runes.

chapters.title: Something's Wrong
chapters.description: Maya discovers the true extent of the monitoring systems and meets Marcus, a security specialist who may be her only ally in understanding the sinister technology controlling their coworkers.
